attributes.action: Stop governments being reliant on taxes, borrowing and so on for their money.
attributes.background: It’s time we stopped governments being reliant on taxes and so on for their money. It’s time we developed and made public services and good causes free to finance for governments all across the world via their national banks. National banks should have unlimited funds.  Https://helptheworld.live

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
